actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for bonus depreciation or an additional minimum tax credit in lieu of such bonus depreciation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase from 30 to 50% the rate of the special depreciation allowance (bonus depreciation) for certain business equipment and assets placed in service in 2008; and (2) allow a corporation to elect to increase its alternative minimum tax credit by its bonus depreciation amount in lieu of applying such allowance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for bonus depreciation or an additional minimum tax credit in lieu of such bonus depreciation.
